resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Registeel is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Registeel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Clear Body
entries: Registeel is immune to any effect that would cause it to gain disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, or saving throws.

trait.name: Damage Threshold
entries: Registeel has immunity to all damage unless it takes an amount of damage that equals or exceeds 10.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Registeel makes two Iron Head attacks and two Flash Cannon attacks. It can replace any two attacks with a Steel Roller or a Steel Beam attack, available.

action.name: Iron Head
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Flash Cannon
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) force damage.

action.name: Steel Roller {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Steel Beam {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 5d8 + 6}) force damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Superpower (1/Day)
entries: Registeel regains 100 hit points. Until the end of it next turn, it has disadvantage on all attack rolls, and attack rolls against it have advantage.
